trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised when the first HTTP module in the web application references the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=fullName>当 web 应用程序中的第一个 HTTP 模块引用时引发事件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The first access of the this property causes a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object to be created and initialized from configuration.
trans-unit.target: 首次访问此属性会导致<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>对象，用于创建并从配置初始化。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: You can access the newly created <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in an event handler in order to examine or modify it.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问新创建的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>对象，通过<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>检查或修改它。 为了的事件处理中的属性</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified federation configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs"></xref>指定联合身份验证配置对象的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A> property to the federation configuration object specified by `config`.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A>属性设置为指定的联合身份验证配置对象`config`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A>
联合身份验证配置对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> object contains the configurable properties for the WS-Federation Authentication Module (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule"></xref>) and the Session Authentication Module (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"></xref>) in a web application.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"> </xref>对象为 WS 联合身份验证模块包含可配置属性 (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule"></xref>) 和会话身份验证模块 (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"></xref>) 的 web 应用中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the federation configuration object that was initialized from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置从配置文件的已初始化的联合身份验证配置对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object contains the configurable properties for the WS-Federation Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>) and the Session Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>) in a web application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>对象为 WS 联合身份验证模块包含可配置属性 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>) 和会话身份验证模块 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>) 的 web 应用中。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: To modify the configuration settings, you can set properties on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object that is referenced by this property, or you can provide an new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要修改的配置设置，你可以设置属性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>对象引用此属性，也可以提供新<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>对象。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: The federation configuration object that was initialized from configuration.
trans-unit.target: 从配置初始化联合身份验证配置对象。
